headline: Inbound Engine Proposal
subheadline: A proven system for generating sales-ready opportunities through strategic paid advertising and lead qualification.
situationPoints: You've built a successful security system business through referrals and word-of-mouth, but growth has plateaued
Previous attempts at digital marketing with other agencies didn't deliver the quality of leads you need
You're looking to expand your service area and need a predictable flow of qualified commercial opportunities
Your team's time is valuable - you can't afford to chase unqualified leads or tire-kickers
You want to focus on what you do best (installations) while a partner handles lead generation
solutionOverview: We leverage Google Ads strategies to put you in front of high-value buyers at the exact moment they're searching for security system installation and monitoring services. Every inquiry is captured and logged in a simple pipeline you can see and manage.

faqs.question: How quickly will I start seeing leads?
faqs.answer: Most clients see their first leads within 14 days as campaigns go live. The full 60-day build and proof phase is about stabilizing volume, improving quality, and pushing toward the agreed opportunity target.

faqs.question: What happens if it doesn't work?
faqs.answer: If you meet the agreed stipulations and we don't deliver the promised volume of sales-ready opportunities, our guarantee applies and we refund 100% of our management fee for that period.

faqs.question: What do you need from us to make this successful?
faqs.answer: Respond to leads fast, dedicate time each day to nurture opportunities, and follow up on every opportunity until you get a clear yes/no.

faqs.question: How much time does this require from our team?
faqs.answer: Outside of onboarding and a simple review rhythm, your time investment is minimal. You focus on calls and closing; we handle the system.

faqs.question: Can we pause or cancel?
faqs.answer: After the initial 60-day build and proof phase, it's month-to-month with no long contracts. You stay because the engine produces opportunities and revenue.
